dictionariesPath.title: Dictionaries Path
dictionariesPath.description: Path for the spell checker dictionaries. It depends on your operational system. This package will try to identify automatically your default dictionary path based on your operational system, however it mail fail if you have non-standard settings.

locale.title: Language Locale
locale.description: Locale string for the language to spell check (Examples: en_US, pt_BR, Es_ES, etc). On Windows it does not have effect as it is managed in a different way.

checkOtherSpellChecker.title: Always check for other spell checkers
checkOtherSpellChecker.description: If checked, then verifies for other spell checkers that may conflict with the package.
